channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why investors clinging to cash could lose money in U.S. debt-ceiling fight
McDonald’s new McValue menu foreshadows cheaper fast food elsewhere
America’s frozen housing market is finally starting to thaw
Rich families try new tactics to prevent heirs from squandering wealth: ‘joyous’ vibes and escape rooms
item.description: Wealth managers use these techniques to help their clients avoid the 'third generation curse.'

item.title: Accenture CEO Julie Sweet asks new hires what they’ve learned in the last 6 months: ‘If they can’t answer that question, we know they’re not a learner’
item.description: Julie Sweet wants workers to be ready to adapt amid AI's radical impact on the way we work.

item.title: Why Nvidia is betting on agentic AI use for enterprises
item.description: The tech giant is preparing for its next phase of growth.

item.title: Tech stocks get slammed after economic data spark a jump in bond yields
U.S. stocks tumble as Treasury yields surge after jobs, services-sector data
Exclusive: Movement Labs set to close $100 million funding round as crypto markets heat up
item.description: Movement is building a layer-2 blockchain on Ethereum using technology from Facebook's failed crypto project.

item.title: There’s a $32 trillion reason to bet big on women entrepreneurs as your 2025 investment resolution
item.description: Female entrepreneurs, long underserved by VCs, often recognize opportunities that have been hiding in plain sight.
